title: Enable Development Computer Communication (Windows)
introduction: To communicate from your MATLABÂ® development computer (WindowsÂ®) to your SpeedgoatÂ® target computer by using an Ethernet connection, perform a one-time configuration of your MATLAB development computer (Windows) Ethernet port to use Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4) only. Specify a nonroutable static IP address of the form 192.168.x.x.
